noun.description: A ceratopsian dinosaur of the family Ceratopsidae (which includes Triceratops), characterized by elaborate horns and frills on the skull.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the family Ceratopsidae.

origin: Early 20th century; earliest use found in Science. From scientific Latin Ceratopsidae, family name from Ceratops, genus name + -idae.
